title: Can't login

embed.description: Grab two rune pages for the price of one on purchases made with both RP and IP. Head over to the Bundles tab in the store to find the 2 for 1 Rune Pages item. Fill out those newly acquired rune pages! All Tier 3 runes are 30% off!

body:
I could login but game crashed.

Aaaaand then can't even get in.
